sentences.en: Elephants and other animals could walk freely without scraping their head on the ceiling -- with plenty of room to spare.
sentences.cn: 大象和其他动物可以自由走动而不让天花板刮到它们的头部——那里有着充足的备用空间。

sentences.en: He led his life , pinching and scraping.
He spent all day scraping paint off the walls.
sentences.cn: 他一整天都在刮墙壁上的漆.

sentences.en: Hungry, cold, I tripped and fell, scraping my hands.
sentences.cn: 我肚里饿, 身上冷, 跌了几跤, 手掌也擦破了.

sentences.en: I can't bear the sound of chalk scraping on a blackboard.
sentences.cn: 我受不了粉笔在黑板上摩擦时发出的刺耳声音.

sentences.en: It was so windy that the branches were scraping against the window panes.
sentences.cn: 风很大,树枝在玻璃窗上拂来拂去.

sentences.en: Or, like me, you can go back and forth, alternatively scraping off the accumulated gunk and making yourself more accessible by taking on more of it.
sentences.cn: 或者像我一样，你可以后退或者前进，抑或是刮去那堆堆积物，通过呈现更多使你自己变得更加容易接近。

sentences.en: Patrick lifted the gate to prevent It'scraping along the ground.
sentences.cn: 帕特里克把门抬起来免得刮着地面.

sentences.en: She stumbled and fell, scraping her palms and knees.
sentences.cn: 她绊了一下摔倒了，手掌和膝盖都蹭破了。

sentences.en: She went round the car scraping the frost off the windows.
sentences.cn: 她把结霜的车窗挨个儿擦干净。

sentences.en: The car hurtled past us, scraping the wall and screeching to a halt.
sentences.cn: 汽车从我们身边疾驰而过，蹭到墙壁上然后戛然刹住。

sentences.en: The children always loved scraping out the bowl in which we had mixed the cake.
sentences.cn: 孩子们总爱刮我们调过蛋糕粉的碗.

sentences.en: The house was silent but for the scraping of a branch on the slates.
sentences.cn: 这所房子寂静无声,只听见树枝刮擦着石板瓦吱吱作响.

sentences.en: The only sound is that of knives and forks scraping against china.
sentences.cn: 只听见刀叉摩擦瓷器的刺耳声。

sentences.en: There was a scraping noise on the back porch.
sentences.cn: 这时后院走廊上传来一阵刮擦的声音.

sentences.en: There was a scraping sound as she dragged the heels of her shoes along the pavement.
sentences.cn: 她拖着脚走，鞋跟蹭着人行道嚓嚓作响。

sentences.en: We're barely scraping by on my salary.
sentences.cn: 我们靠我的工资勉强度日。

words.tran_cn: 刮削下的碎屑；刮擦声；抹去
